name: AS_GSS_UT_duplicateEvaluationPhases
description: rule to update the phase details with  new evaluation  details and update fields  with null value
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!phases,
  expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase'(
    evaluationPhaseId: null,
    evaluation: ri!newEvaluation,
    duration: fv!item.duration,
    durationUnit: fv!item.durationUnit,
    refPhase: fv!item.refPhase,
    startDate: null,
    endDate: null,
    createdBy: null,
    createdDatetime: null,
    modifiedBy: null,
    modifiedDatetime: null,
    isActive: true
  )
)
